text: Jisuna Bethany-da leiringeida, yamna kiningai oiraba unsagi lainana naramba mi ama Simon-gi yumda leirammi. Amasung Jisuna charingeida nupi amana asengba nard-na14:3 Nard: Himalay chingsanggi lamdamsingda houba manam nungsiba thao amadi mahi semnaba pambi ama. semba tanglaba, manam nungsiraba teinathao thanna yaoba alabaster kouba nungouna saba chaphu ama puduna laklammi. Aduga mahakna chaphu adu thugairaduna hangdoklaga manam nungsiraba teinathao adu Ibungogi kokthakta heithabirammi.
